Subseries I.B. Individuals and Family Groups: Medium Format
Series I. Individuals and Family Groups
Subseries I.B. Individuals and Family Groups: Medium Format

Allegorical Scenes Bicentennial Celebration, 1932 Portraits ....after Peale ....after Savage ....after Stuart ....after Stuart, Landsdown portrait ....after Trumbull Ahorse Busts ....in mufti ....in uniform Coach Full-length Groups ....with family ....with cabinet Photomechanical prints Scenes from life ....Inauguration and presidency ....Military situations ....Photomechanical prints Sculptures and bas reliefs Various (Includes print "Cornwallis Resigning His Sword to Washington" ; front page of "Ballou's Pictorial" of February 19, 1859; front pages of "Harper's Weekly" for February 24, 1866, and February 27, 1869; and Evacuation Day image from "Harper's Weekly" of December 1, 1866.) [source: anonymous donation, May 2019]
